title: WaterMaze Wastewater Treatment System
item_description:
• Year of Manufacturing: 2018-2020
  • Hours of Operation: Unknown (commissioned in 2022, decommissioned in 2024)
  • CLT-600 Modular Clarifier System Base
    • Model: CLT-600
    • Serial: 11034350-162522
  • Automatic Maintenance Control Retrofit Kit for Automating Treatment Systems
    • Model: AMC-1000
    • Serial: 11034060-100266
    • 120v
    • Single Phase
    • 60HZ
  • Unit was functioning at time of decommissioned
  • Black sediment tanks are empty
  • Resin tanks may have resin still inside
  • Specifications PDF (If the pictures do not show it, it will not be included) 
  • Manufactures Website 

Removal Information: This item is only available for pickup on Friday, August 22nd, 2025, between 8:00 AM and 12:00 PM. Buyer must arrive onsite wearing pants, boots, and a safety vest.
